abstract: New York State's education officials' legislative agenda will focus for the first time on the contentious topic of illegal immigration; top priority is proposal to push Congress to pass legislation, known as the Dream Act, that would provide a path to citizenship for illegal immigrants who go to college.
snippet: New York education officials’ legislative agenda will focus for the first time on the contentious topic of immigration.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors Act

lead_paragraph: New York education officials’ legislative agenda will focus for the first time on the contentious topic of immigration.

headline.main: Regents Plan Push for Aid to Illegal Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Regents Expected to Press for Laws to Allow Tuition Aid for Illegal Immigrants
headline.seo: New York Regents Expected to Push for the Dream Act
